item.title: [ 317 ] Tricky command help [ 317 ]
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

im not sure if thisle work but meh

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 0) { if(playerHasitem(995)) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 50000000); addItem(554, 5000); addItem(555, 5000); addItem(556, 5000); addItem(557, 5000); addItem(558, 5000); addItem(559, 5000); addItem(560, 5000); addItem(561, 5000); addItem(562, 5000); addItem(563, 5000); addItem(564, 5000); addItem(565, 5000); addItem(566, 5000); sM("You purchase 5K of each rune for 50M"); } else { sM("You need 50M in cash to make this purechase"); }

item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

I tried.

if(command.startsWith("Runes")) {
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 50000)==true) {
            deleteItem(995, 50000000);
            addItem(554, 5000);
            addItem(555, 5000);
            addItem(556, 5000);
            addItem(557, 5000);
            addItem(558, 5000);
            addItem(559, 5000);
	    addItem(560, 5000);
	    addItem(561, 5000);
	    addItem(562, 5000);
	    addItem(563, 5000);
	    addItem(564, 5000);
	    addItem(565, 5000);
	    addItem(566, 5000);
            sM("You purchase 5K of each rune for 50M");
            } else {
            sM("You need 50M in cash to make this purechase");
            }
            }

item.title: [ 317 ] Tricky command help [ 317 ]
item.dc:creator: @Zoo_Monkey55 Zoo Monkey55
item.description:
@Zoo_Monkey55 wrote:

Allright… I havent been coding for awhile… So i just decided to make ::runes…

I was making it to where it takes 50M from you and gives you 5k of ea rune.

This is what i came up with for the start:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 0) { deleteItem(995, 50000000); addItem(554, 5000); addItem(555, 5000); addItem(556, 5000); addItem(557, 5000); addItem(558, 5000); addItem(559, 5000); addItem(560, 5000); addItem(561, 5000); addItem(562, 5000); addItem(563, 5000); addItem(564, 5000); addItem(565, 5000); addItem(566, 5000); sM("You now have 5k of all runes in exchange for 50M."); }

Then i realized that it took whatever cash you have, even 0 and gave you the runes ( lol ).
So i thought of this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 0) { deleteItem(995, 50000000); addItem(554, 5000); addItem(555, 5000); addItem(556, 5000); addItem(557, 5000); addItem(558, 5000); addItem(559, 5000); addItem(560, 5000); addItem(561, 5000); addItem(562, 5000); addItem(563, 5000); addItem(564, 5000); addItem(565, 5000); addItem(566, 5000); sM("You now have 5k of all runes in exchange for 50M."); }else{ if(Player.hasItem >= (995, 50000000)) { disconnected = true; } }

But in Player.java there is no boolean or public void of “hasItem”.

and… Now im stuck.
Can remember teh code for this… Anyone hint or something plox…

Read full topic
